com.dff.sygic.action

Class SygicActionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dff.sygic.event.AbstractSygicEventListener
      • com.dff.sygic.action.SygicActionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SygicEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SygicPluginActionHandler

    public class SygicActionHandler
extends AbstractSygicEventListener
    Takes care that Sygic navigation service is connected and navigation app is running before action is executed.
    Author:
    dff solutions
